title: 2020 Annual Report
body: TerraVolt showed progress on VOLTMAX prototypes with successful demonstrations. Reported revenue $48.5M in 2020. Main risks include safety testing, raw material dependencies. ESG commitments launched on recycling and sustainable sourcing.

title: 2021 Annual Report
body: Revenue rose to $65.2M with first utility pilot contracts secured. Product roadmap broadened and Series funding discussions advanced.

title: 2022 Annual Report
body: Revenue reached $89.3M with FlowCell X commercial launch. PG&E and European utilities eyed for growth. Patent count reached 33.

title: 2023 Annual Report
body: Revenue lifted to $116.7M on PG&E win. Manufacturing scaling accelerated. Temporary supply tightness noted in raw materials.

title: 2024 Annual Report
body: Revenue $139.5M despite supply delays in Q1. Mitigation strategies restored resilience by end-2024. ESG expansion with new recycling plant initiative.

title: VOLTMAX Solid-State Battery Demo
body: Live demo at utility site demonstrated improved energy density and fire safety protocols. Early commitments from utilities explored.

title: First Utility Pilot Contract
body: Signed with European energy major for pilot installations, validating product in commercial settings.

title: FlowCell X Launch
body: Announced commercial readiness for FlowCell system, enabling 8-hr+ grid support. Advanced flow chemistry secured patent IP.

title: PG&E Grid Storage Contract
body: $50M contract for CALISO grid storage capacity. Deployed a mix of solid-state and flow systems.

title: Supply Chain Shortages
body: Cathode material supply delayed shipments by quarter. Mitigation explored through diversified suppliers.

title: Supply Chain Stability Restored
body: Secured long-term contracts with BASF and Umicore. Announced production recovery.

title: Green Technology Alliance JV
body: Formed strategic JV with EcoFlow Dynamics C010 and StratoSky Aerospace C015 to deliver integrated clean energy solutions, combining storage, carbon capture, and renewable launches.

title: Q2 2025 Earnings Beat
body: Revenue $38.1M, net income $7.6M in Q2, record-breaking quarter with new energy-as-service contracts. Full-year guidance raised.
